wikipedia_page.main: James Waltham Curtis (c. 1839 – 18 September 1901), possibly born Charles James Waltham Curtis, was an English-born painter, illustrator, and photographic colourist who became an early practitioner of a distinctively Australian style of art.

response: * James Waltham Curtis (c. 1839–1901): painter, illustrator, and photographic colourist
* James Waltham Curtis (1839–1901), English-born artist in Australia
